movies.title: Arthur 3: la guerre des deux mondes
movies.plot: Maltazard, the Evil M, is now 7 feet tall and evolving among the humans, causing terror wherever he goes. His goal is simple: forming an army of giant henchmen and ruling over the universe. Meanwhile, Arthur is still a Minimoy, and thus in a state where he's unable to fend him off. With the help of Selenia and Betameche, he hatches a plan to regain his usual size: all they must do is infiltrate Arthur's house through the pipeworks, catch an electric train from his bedroom to his grandfather's study and find an elixir that will make him grow back to his human size. Sounds simple enough, if it weren't for Darkos, Maltazard's own son, hot on their tails.
movies.simplePlot: With Maltazard now 7 feet tall and Arthur still 2 inches small, our hero must find a way to grow back to his normal size ans stop the Evil M once and for all, with the help of Selenia and Betameche.

biography.bio: Mia Farrow was born in Los Angeles, California, to director John Farrow and actress and Tarzan-girl Maureen O'Sullivan. Her father was Australian-born (of English descent) and her mother was Irish-born (of Irish, Scottish, and English ancestry). Farrow debuted at the movies in 1959 in very small roles. She was noticed for the first time in the film Rosemary's Baby (1968) by Roman Polanski. She showed her talent also on TV and at the theatre, but her final breakthrough was when she met Woody Allen and became his Muse after the film A Midsummer Night's Sex Comedy (1982). After that, Woody Allen wrote many other roles for her.
biography.name: Mia Farrow

biography.bio: Ron Crawford is known for his work on Arthur and the Invisibles (2006), Arthur 3: la guerre des deux mondes (2010) and Blood Ties (2013).
biography.name: Ron Crawford

biography.bio: Robert Stanton was born on March 8, 1963 in San Antonio, Texas, USA as Robert Lloyd Stanton. He is known for his work on Mercury Rising (1998), Dennis the Menace (1993) and The Quiet American (2002).
biography.name: Robert Stanton

biography.bio: Penny Balfour is an actress, known for Arthur and the Invisibles (2006), Sidewalks of New York (2001) and Arthur et la vengeance de Maltazard (2009).
biography.name: Penny Balfour

biography.bio: Richard Davis is an actor, known for Arthur 3: la guerre des deux mondes (2010), Malefactor (2003) and Welcome Home (2014).
biography.name: Richard Davis

biography.bio: Jean Bejote Njamba is an actor, known for Arthur and the Invisibles (2006), Arthur 3: la guerre des deux mondes (2010) and Arthur et la vengeance de Maltazard (2009).
biography.name: Jean Bejote Njamba

biography.bio: Valéry Koko Kingue is an actor, known for Arthur and the Invisibles (2006) and Arthur 3: la guerre des deux mondes (2010).
biography.name: Valéry Koko Kingue

biography.bio: Aba Koïta is an actor, known for Arthur and the Invisibles (2006) and Arthur 3: la guerre des deux mondes (2010).
biography.name: Aba Koïta

biography.bio: Laurent Mendy is an actor, known for Arthur 3: la guerre des deux mondes (2010), Mic Macs à Tire-Larigot (2009) and Clara s'en va mourir (2012).
biography.name: Laurent Mendy

biography.bio: Bienvenue Kindoki is an actor, known for Arthur and the Invisibles (2006) and Arthur 3: la guerre des deux mondes (2010).
biography.name: Bienvenue Kindoki

biography.bio: Steve Routman was born on August 28, 1962 in Washington, District of Columbia, USA. He is an actor, known for The Wolf of Wall Street (2013), Inside Llewyn Davis (2013) and The Bourne Legacy (2012).
biography.name: Steve Routman

biography.bio: David Gasman is an actor and director from Seattle, Washington. He received a B.F.A from the professional actor training program at the Cornish College of the Arts. He later studied with Polish theatre director Jerzy Grotowski and did Shakespeare throughout the western United States. Gasman has done roles in over fifty theatrical productions, and also works extensively as a voice actor and director in cartoons, video games, commercials and documentaries. He has also appeared in small roles in several films. David Gasman lives in Paris, France.
biography.name: David Gasman

biography.bio: Cooper Daniels was born as Christopher Peter Cooper. He is an actor, known for Arthur 3: la guerre des deux mondes (2010), Dude, Where's My Scooter? (2003) and Friends of the Bride (2012).
biography.name: Cooper Daniels

biography.bio: Norman Stokle was born on November 22, 1933 in County Durham, England. He was an actor, known for Heavy Rain (2010), Arthur 3: la guerre des deux mondes (2010) and IP5: L'île aux pachydermes (1992). He died on February 24, 2016 in Fresno, California, USA.
biography.name: Norman Stokle

biography.bio: Stuart Rudin was born on December 16, 1941 in Vancouver, Washington, USA. He is an actor, known for The Silence of the Lambs (1991), Léon: The Professional (1994) and Stake Land (2010).
biography.name: Stuart Rudin
